title: Calories in a Hershey Bar
meta_description: Discover calories in a Hershey bar, including full nutrition breakdown like fat, carbs, protein, and quick variations for different flavors.
assumptions: Standard 1.55 oz (43 g) Hershey's Milk Chocolate bar; no additional toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, size, batch, and manufacturer; check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A standard Hershey bar contains about 210 calories and 3 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Hershey bar with almonds (adds nuts per bar)

faqs.q: How many calories in a Hershey bar?
faqs.a: A standard Hershey's Milk Chocolate bar has 210 calories.

faqs.q: What are the macros in a Hershey bar?
faqs.a: About 13 g fat, 24 g carbs (23 g sugars), 3 g protein, and 1 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does a Hershey bar have trans fat?
faqs.a: No, standard Hershey bars contain 0 g trans fat.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in a Hershey bar?
faqs.a: Approximately 23 g of sugars per bar.

faqs.q: Are Hershey bars high in saturated fat?
faqs.a: Yes, with about 8 g saturated fat per bar from cocoa butter and milk.
